items.title: Tourist plane crash in Kenya kills 11 on board
items.description: Ten Europeans and a local pilot have died after the plane crashed while flying to a game park.

items.title: Israel says coffin from Hamas did not contain another hostage's body
items.description: Israel accuses Hamas of a "clear violation" of the Gaza ceasefire deal and says officials are discussing "steps in response".

items.title: Rare earths, Nobel nomination and cheers: Trump ends Japan leg of Asia tour
items.description: The red carpet was rolled out for Trump by Japan's Sanae Takaichi, who has only been prime minister since last week.

items.title: Man pleads guilty to killing Japan's former PM Shinzo Abe
items.description: Tetsuya Yamagami, 45, shot Abe multiple times as he appeared at a political event in 2022.

items.title: Sudan's army loses key city of el-Fasher to paramilitary RSF after 18-month siege
items.description: The UN has raised the alarm over reports of "atrocities" committed by the RSF.
